metaDescription:
Billsby is a feature-rich "Saas" recurring payment platform, ranked as the leading subscription billing software by G2.

Billsby is designed to ensure customers can go live quickly, often within 1-2 hours.  To help facilitate this process we have a team of friendly knowledgeable advisors ready to help your business go live.

Billsby specializes in providing great customer service at an affordable price point - our technology is rated No 1 on G2 by our customers.

If you are a developer creating a solution for your customer, Billsby has a friendly well-documented API.  The Billsby team are here to provide support to developers in order to ensure a smooth migration or new system build.

Why not book a call, talk through your Billing requirements and we can let you know how we can help you transform your business..

Billsby specializes in providing great customer service at an affordable price point - our technology is rated No 1 on G2 by our customers.

If you are a developer creating a solution for your customer, Billsby has a friendly well-documented API.  The Billsby team are here to provide support to developers in order to ensure a smooth migration or new system build.

Why not book a call, talk through your Billing requirements and we can let you know how we can help you transform your business..

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of customers you would like to view

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of records to return per page

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: You can order the subscriptions by any of the subscription object properties (e.g. CreatedOn to sort by date of creation)

parameters.name: orderByDescending
parameters.description: The ordering direction of the previously set property (e.g. Descending in CreatedOn will sort from newest to oldest, non-descending from oldest to newest)

parameters.name: isActive
parameters.description: Will show only the subscriptions that are active

parameters.name: isInFreeTrial
parameters.description: Will show only the subscriptions that are in free trial

parameters.name: productName
parameters.description: Will show only the subscriptions that has products whose names matches the value provided here

parameters.name: planName
parameters.description: Will show only the subscriptions that has plans whose names matches the value provided here

parameters.description: Sort the results by particular properties

parameters.name: orderByDescending

parameters.name: isPending
parameters.description: Do you want to show invoices with the status 'pending'; true or false

parameters.description: Do you want to show invoices with the status 'unpaid'; true or false

parameters.description: Do you want to show invoices with the status 'paid offline'; true or false

repositoryDescription: Billsby is a top-rated Saas subscription billing platform with quick setup, excellent customer support, and a developer-friendly API. Transform your business with Billsby today. Billsby's {language} SDK generated by Konfig (https://konfigthis.com/).
